pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$()$(br)Provides Fire Resistance on a cooldown.$(br2)Higher levels last longer and have a shorter cooldown.$(br2)$(bold)Trained By:$()$(br)Being on Fire (does not require taking fire damage)$(br2)$(bold)Maximum Level:$() 5
